com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client
Class View

java.lang.Object
  Composite
      com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
IView
public abstract class View
extends Composite
implements IView

The view is the graphical part of the application get datas from model use controler to action on the system USAGE: The view could be implemented by a component or a group of components The contructor must be call by the controller of the view.

key

controller

Constructor Detail

View

public View(java.lang.String key,
            Controller controller,
            ModelForView... models)
Build an abstract view. The view listen to his controller changes. The view listen to his models changes.

Parameters:
key - Unique id for this view
controller - the controler which manage the view
models - The different models on which the view could get the value. USAGE: pass Model instance, not ModelForView Instance.
Method Detail

init

public abstract void init()
Description copied from interface: IView
Enable to initialise the view elsewhere than in the constructor. It could be used to REinitialise the view.
